comment: We didn't have anything [as kids]. We [my siblings, who live here with me, and I] couldn't afford anything. So now that we can, I find it difficult to find a balance.
My sister has a friend who has a baby boy in Poland and in Poland it’s not so easy so we try to send things to her when there’s something left.
Diapers here are cheap. Very, very, cheap. It's ridiculous how expensive diapers are in Poland.
